alert.note: Alert for Steuben; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 20 at 8:24PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Yates and north central Steuben Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 824 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cohocton, or 11 miles east of Dansville, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wayland, Cohocton and Atlanta. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 390 between 2 and 3. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
